719031f-b.text:
Colonial Park: Children playing in the middle section of this narrow park that parallels Bradhurst Avenue. Buildings seen on the east side of same are north from W. 147th Street. No. 2 is eastward from the slope and shows a group playing baseball in the area above the childrens playground. In this instance the buildings seen are between 150th (right)and 151st
Streets.
August 29, 1935.
View 2: September 1, 1935.
P. L. Sperr
